member.name: M:SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.TestUpdateCharacterStrengthAndAgility(SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Requests.Users.TestUpdateCharacterStrengthAndAgilityRequest)
member.summary: Test Update the Strength and Agility of a Character
member.remarks: Test Update the Strength and Agility of a Character specified by Character. We also require a valid UserSessionGUID
member.param:
CustomerGUID - This is the API Key.
UserSessionGUID - This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains the CharacterName we need to update.
CharacterName - This is the name of the character to update.
Strength - This is the Strength value to update. Agility - This is the Agility value to update.

member.name: M:SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.AddOrUpdateCustomCharacterDataCustomization(SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Requests.Users.AddOrUpdateCustomCharacterDataCustomizationRequest)
member.remarks: Add or Update CustomCharacterData for the Character Customization specified by Character. We also require a valid UserSessionGUID
member.param:
CustomerGUID - This is the API Key.
UserSessionGUID - This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains the CharacterName we need to update.
AddOrUpdateCustomCharacterData - This is the Value to update.

member.name: M:SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.AddOrUpdateRaceClassGender(SoulwalkerPublicAPI.Requests.Users.AddOrUpdateRaceClassGenderRequest)
member.remarks: Add or Update CustomCharacterData for the Race, Class and Gender specified by Character. We also require a valid UserSessionGUID
member.param:
CustomerGUID - This is the API Key.
UserSessionGUID - This is a valid UserSessionGUID that contains the CharacterName we need to update.
AddOrUpdateCustomCharacterData - This is the Value of Race, Class and Gender to update.
